rules_text:
[i]Proficiency[/i] – Whenever this creature becomes a target of an activated ability you control, untap it. Each ability source triggers this only once each turn.
{T}: Voltaic Construct gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Proficiency — Whenever you activate an ability targeting _2 MV5 Voltaic Construct, untap it. Each ability source triggers this only once each turn.
